1.title: Who Will It Be???

11.content:
Josh Hutcherson got out of bed and went to his closet. He picked out some clothes and took his pajamas off. When he pulled his jeans up, however, he noticed they were tighter than he remembered. He struggled a little to get them buttoned, but eventually succeeded.

Once his pants were on, he looked in the mirror. He was surprised to see a small belly starting to stick out over the waist of his jeans. Of course, he hadn't been very busy the last couple months and had spent most of his time home doing nothing.

"Josh!" his mom called from downstairs. "Come get breakfast!"

Josh hurried to put on his shirt--which also felt smaller than he remembered--and ran downstairs. He hadn't realized how hungry he was until his mom called him.
11.title: Chubby Josh

choices: He decides to finish the food.
111.content:
Josh ran into the kitchen and stopped dead in the doorway, staring at the spread his mom had put out.

Covering the entire table was everything a boy could imagine eating for breakfast. Eggs, bacon, sausage, toast, giant stacks of waffles and pancakes, and several boxes of dodnuts.

"Mom, why is there so much food?" Josh asked in wonder, staring at the feast in front of him.

"Oh, I was just in a cooking mood. I guess I got a little carried away, huh?" she answered.

"Not at all," said Josh, and he sat in front of the table and started pulling food over to him. He started with the donuts. By the time he finished a dozen of them, his stomach was pressing against his jeans and shirt. He was able to eat all of the eggs before he had to unbutton his jeans. He finished off the bacon and sausage and half of the waffles and pancakes. He was starting to feel full and didn't know whether or not to keep eating. His mom had gone upstairs to get a shower so he was alone. He lifted up his shirt and looked at his belly. It was sticking out a good 5 inches and was soft but tight when he felt it. He stood up and the bottom of his belly poked out from under his shirt a little.
111.title: Morning Feast

choices: Wants To Get Fatter And Go Out In Public
1113.content:
As he was standing up, he heard his cell phone ring. He reached in his pocket and saw that his friend, Cody, was calling. Cody had blonde hair, fair skin, and was the same height as Josh. He looks like Cody Martin from The Suite Life. Josh picked up the phone.

"Hey man! What's up?" Josh asked.

"Nothing much. Eating breakfast! How about you?" Cody asked.

"Same here," Josh said, giggling as he saw his belly.

"Well hey, do you want to hang out or do you have filming?" Cody asked.

"I have no filming at all. Let's hang! I'll be over there soon!" Josh said. They continued to talk and hung up the phone after. Come to think of it, Josh had no filming for the last while. Sure, he was rich, but he was sort of being lazy and he knew it. Josh got himself dressed up into nice clothes, although his belly was still revealed. He tried dressing up very nicely since he...
1113.title: The Phone Rings

13.content:
Jake had just finished a shoot for The Wizards Of Waverly Place. The episode was about Jake using a spell to try to grow some muscle on him. The twist was that the spell backfired and Jake accidentally made himself gain 25 lbs. His fake belly had been made of the same stuff as a fat suit.

The episode ended and Jake had to take off the "belly." After a while, he started wanting to put it back on. He realized that he liked the feeling of having the extra mass hanging off of his stomach. He'd even become slightly turned on from the feeling.

Jake looked down at his flat stomach and wished the "magic" he used in the show was real so he could use it to make himself chubbier. He decided then that he would eat twice as much as he normally did so he would grow.
13.title: Jake's Taste Of The Fat Life

info.brief_description: There are many famous kids who need to be fat. Male only. Please add to get it started!
info.description:
Rules:

1) Boys only
2) No sudden weight gain (ex: 100lbs to 500lbs in an instant)
3) They can be gay, and sex is allowed
4) No magic gaining
5) No shrinking/GT
6) Vore is allowed

Other than that, have fun with it.
